text:
"The detachment?"

"Me, you, and two others from ROMEO, four more from LIMA."

"The air crew?"

"No."

"The radio?"

"The radio is fucked."

"You can see the fire from a mile away. They'll be on us soon. We have to move."

"We can't go south."

"We could go east, to the sea. The fleet is offshore. An escort would see us."

"How far is it?"

"At least 80 klicks."

"To the sea..."

"To the sea."
